name: sge0fodjrn
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c6, cv(s1)), c4))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

comment: Re-index a nonnegative extended sum using an onto function with disjoint range, when the empty set is assigned ` 0 ` in the sum (this is true, for example, both for measures and outer measures). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
